title: How to Make a Strawberry Lemonade Smoothie

steps.headline: Gather your ingredients and other items you will need.
steps.description: See "Ingredients" and "Things You'll Need" sections above and below.

steps.headline: Add in the lemon juice, strawberries, honey, sugar, and water into the blender.
steps.description: If you'd like, you can cut out the sugar or add handfuls of other fruits into the smoothie as well.

steps.headline: Pour into glasses.
steps.description: Add in a few ice cubes if you'd like.

text: Gather your ingredients and other items you will need. See "Ingredients" and "Things You'll Need" sections above and below. Add in the lemon juice, strawberries, honey, sugar, and water into the blender. If you'd like, you can cut out the sugar or add handfuls of other fruits into the smoothie as well. Blend until completely smooth. Shake for about 10 seconds afterward. Pour into glasses. Add in a few ice cubes if you'd like. Serve with fruit and enjoy!
sentences: Gather your ingredients and other items you will need.
See "Ingredients" and "Things You'll Need" sections above and below.
Add in the lemon juice, strawberries, honey, sugar, and water into the blender.
If you'd like, you can cut out the sugar or add handfuls of other fruits into the smoothie as well.
Add in a few ice cubes if you'd like.
